title:
Generalized foliations for homeomorphisms isotopic to a pseudo-Anosov
  homeomorphism: a geometric realization of a result by Fathi
abstract:
We give a new proof of a result by Fathi, which states that, to any
homeomorphism of a closed surface which is isotopic to a pseudo-Anosov
homeomorphism, we can associate a stable and an unstable invariant partition of
the surface with properties which are similar to the unstable and the stable
foliation of a pseudo-Anosov homeomorphism.
